data: Mr. Johnson Subedi Mr. Johnson Subedi is a 18 year old young Technopreneur from Parbat. He is co-founder of AuraED, a non-profit organization, which focuses on spreading digital literacy all over Nepal by interacting with the underprivileged kids physically and teaching them different aspects of technology. Currently, He is working as a python programming intern at Bloom Nepal. He animate the visualizations of the contents of the academics which is helping students(with low facility) in Bloom Nepal school to understand the content clearly and visually. Apart from that, He is also working on his own research about improving the Nepalese share market by using technology like Blockchain and smart contracts which helps to improve transparency in the market, cut off intermediaries, reduces costs and commissions to invest in the market and also reduces market manipulation.
